content.description: Stand start ten feet to the right of the normal start for Super Sonic in a good crack jug. Traverse left into the top portion of Super Sonic on good holds.
content.location: Stand starts ten feet to the right of the normal start for Super Sonic in the split portion of the Crash Site.

content.description: Stand start on a good jug edge on the arete to the right of Outsider. Move up from the edge into a series of interesting moves to top out on good holds.
content.location: Stand starts on the right-hand arete (to the right of Outsider) on the left-hand chunk of Crash Site.

content.description: Stand start on good feet and an interesting vertical half-circle rail feature. Work up the feature on good holds to top out.
content.location: This problem is located on the far left of the side facing Area 51 closest to the rock sculptures.

content.description: Start underneath a small overhang on the far right corner of the boulder. The starting hold is a decent edge. Get good feet and move up through good edges to a large sidepull where the face turns to slab. Get your feet on the slab and work up to grab the top. Mantle it out.
content.location: There is a pile of old sticks and logs at the base of this problem that were put there a long time ago to make the landing better. It is on the far right corner of The Mothership. If you are walking away from the Powerline Cluster, walk through the split and it will be around the side to the left.

content.description: Start sitting on obvious slash-like holds and climb up into the Outsider start holds then finish Outsider
content.location: Crash Site by the trees right on the boulder

content.description: Stand start as for Outsider but instead of going right around the arete to the ear-shaped crimp, go up left to a thin crimp. After that, match your right hand and right foot in the right-hand start pocket, and slowly let go and move your right hand up to a bad crimp below the top edge. From there, grab the top and top out.
content.location: Starts as for Outsider on the side of The Mothership facing away from the Powerline Cluster and the Left Vale. Instead of going up right and around the arete, go left and up.

content.description: Stand start just around the left-hand side of the arete and make a big move up and around the right side of the arete to a decent ear-shaped crimp. From there, use various crimps and slopers to get to the top.
content.location: Stand start on the left-hand side of the arete of The Mothership furthest from the Powerline Cluster. It is roughly 20 feet to the left of Space Invader on the opposite side of the split. The rock has a tan/brown color.

content.description: Sit start on a good hold on a slab and work your way straight up to top out.
content.location: Sit start on a good hold on a slab on the backside of the left (or right, depending on where you are coming from) of the Crash Site. This side faces Area 51. The problem is on the far right of this side.

content.description:
Stand start in the large crack between the two halves on the same crack jug as Super Sonic Jug Haul. Get high feet and somehow get the large crimp flake straight up from the start (not recommended for anyone over 140 pounds). Get a bad left hand on a crimp to the left over the bulge, and then walk your feet out left. Slap out to a sloper mono pocket and then cross into a pocket pinch above that. Move your left hand into a small sharp crimp, move your feet up, and get a bad side pull crimp up and to the right. From there, get high feet and go for the lip.

 Pad well, a fall could be dangerous
content.location: This problem stand starts on the same crack jug as Super Sonic Jug Haul and goes straight up and slightly left.

content.description: Stand start on the left-hand side of the obvious tall Eastern facing side of Crash Site (to the left of Space Invader and Back To The Future). Work up strange pocket crimps and cracks and traverse right crossing Back To The Future to top out on Space Invader.
content.location: Stand starts on the left-hand arete of Crash Site on the Eastern facing tall side. Climbs halfway up (just below the obvious overhang at the top) and traverses right to top out on Space Invader.

content.description: Sit start with hands on rail/pinch and go up on the uncovered holds, finishing slightly right over the big jug. Use care on the dirty top out, and come down via Model Rocket
content.location: Left of the Model Rocket. Area 51 is at your back.

content.description: Stand start on the obvious thin "fin" closest to the Powerline Cluster on the uphill half of the Crash Site. Work up the fin to the high point of the boulder. The landing is quite bad. Walk off on to the top when you can.
content.location: Stand start on the obvious thin "fin" closest to the Powerline Cluster on the uphill half of the Crash Site. You can walk through the crack in between the two halves of the boulder to find the start.

content.description: Sit start on a good flake edge a couple of feet to the left of the start for Boots On The Moon. Make a big move straight up to a sloper edge and then use thin holds and bad feet to top out to the left of Boots On The Moon.
content.location: Sit start on a good flake edge a couple of feet to the left of the start for Boots On The Moon.

content.description: Stand start just opposite of Fin-a-ling on the slab portion of the other half of the boulder (far right side of the large crack between the two halves closest to the Shipyard). There is a left-hand and right-hand undercling. Work up on thin holds and bad feet to the top.
content.location: Stand start just opposite of Fin-a-ling on the slab portion of the other half of the boulder (the far right side of the large crack between the two halves closest to the Powerline Cluster).

content.description: Sit start on the obvious arete four feet to the left of Space Invader and work your way up it to the very top. It's fairly positive the whole way.
content.location: Sit start on the arete to the right of Space Invader on the Crash Site boulder.

content.description: Stand start in pocket features to the left of Space Invader and go straight up the face. Top out slightly to the right of the tallest point of this face.
content.location: Stand starts a couple feet to the left of Space Invader on a large face facing away from the Powerline Cluster and the Left Vale. This face is to the right of Outsider and Super Sonic.

content.description: Start the jug haul but use a good hand and high foot to make a big reach into the good pocket, grab bucket jugs at the lip and top out.I find it hard to believe this hasn't been done so I'll update the name and FA if so.

The main and largest boulder for this area. There are a few smaller blocks scattered to the left and to the right of it. You can walk between the two halves of the boulder and there will be problems in between.
